cities.name: Zenica

interests.description: Medieval fortress above the Bosna River, once a royal town of medieval Bosnia, offering strong historical atmosphere and views.

interests.description: Central green space along the Bosna River, popular for walks, relaxation, and city events.

interests.name: Museum of Zenica
interests.description: Local museum presenting archaeology, medieval Bosnia, and modern history of Zenica and central Bosnia.

cities.name: Burgas

interests.description: Large seaside park stretching along the Black Sea coast, featuring gardens, sculptures, viewpoints, caf√©s, and beach access.

interests.name: Archaeological Museum Burgas
interests.description: Museum showcasing ancient Thracian, Greek, and Roman artifacts from the Burgas region.

interests.name: St. Anastasia Island
interests.description: Small island in Burgas Bay with a monastery, museum, and boat-accessible excursions.

cities.local_food_tip: Try Black Sea seafood, grilled fish, shopska salad, kavarma, and Bulgarian yogurt desserts. Local wines and rakia are common with meals.

ideas.name: Birdwatching

cities.name: Plovdiv

interests.name: Kapana Creative District

cities.name: Ruse

cities.name: Sofia

interests.name: Alexander Nevsky Cathedral
interests.description: Iconic Orthodox cathedral and symbol of Sofia, known for its golden domes and impressive interior mosaics.

interests.name: Serdica Archaeological Complex
interests.description: Open-air ruins of ancient Roman Serdica located beneath the modern city center.

interests.description: Main pedestrian street lined with shops, caf√©s, and views toward Vitosha Mountain.

cities.local_food_tip: Try Bulgarian classics such as shopska salad, banitsa, kavarma, grilled meats, and yogurt-based dishes. Traditional bakeries and caf√©s are found throughout the center.

cities.name: Varna

interests.description: Large coastal park overlooking the Black Sea, featuring walking paths, viewpoints, caf√©s, and cultural landmarks.

interests.description: Impressive ruins of one of the largest Roman bath complexes in the Balkans.

interests.name: Varna Central Beach
interests.description: Popular sandy beach located directly below the Sea Garden cliffs.

interests.description: Medieval rock monastery carved into limestone cliffs north of the city.

cities.local_food_tip: Try Black Sea seafood, fried sprats, shopska salad, kavarma, and Bulgarian desserts. Fresh fish restaurants near the port are especially popular.
